The 5 Dunderville steps

III. Our process

Scroll to explore

III.I

Meet & brief

We say hello to get to know each other and to talk about what needs to be done. What are your communication challenges, opportunities and goals?

Services

  • Goals and vision
  • Research
  • Production consultancy
  • Creative consultancy
III.II

CONCEPT DEVELOPMENT

We put together a proposal for a film solution or develop your initial ideas. By producing initial images in a pre-visualisation accompanied by references and a budget we all get on the same page and make sure we have the same final film, at the right cost, in mind before we start.

Services

  • Creative direction
  • Ideation
  • Synopsis
  • Script
  • Storyboard
  • Styleframe
  • Moodboard
  • References
III.III

PRE-PRODUCTION

You push the button and we GO. Planning and organising everything that is needed for an animation or a shoot. Before we move to the next stage we get together in a pre-production meeting where you can review choices made or select an option where such are presented. Any further questions? Now is the time to ask.

Services

  • Schedule
  • Casting
  • Location scouting
  • Animatic
  • Art direction
  • Set design
III.IV

PRODUCTION

And…..”ACTION”. Everything we’ve dreamt up will be realised either through an animation or live-action shoot, or perhaps a combination of the two. In animation you get to see an animatic where we look at composition, timing and content. In live-action we have an off-line meeting where all the best material from the shoot has been put together in a rough-cut for your review. Initial music or sound ideas are presented. Once you’re satisfied we lock it down.

Services

  • Film shoot
  • Music
  • Modelling
  • Texturing & shading
  • Rigging
  • Animation
  • Lighting
  • Look development
III.V

POST-PRODUCTION

Final touches (though still a ton of work :) Colors, effects, music are all made just right. Once your feedback is incorporated we meet for an on-line session where you get to enjoy the final result. Once you’re happy to approve the masterfiles we begin adapting them for broadcast, print, stream, post or screening.

Services

  • Compositing
  • Color grading
  • Sound effects
  • Visual effects
  • Mastering

READY TO GRAB A COFFEE?

Let's chat
